docna.cdata!:
Malawi - Second Highway Project : Credit
            0523 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Malawi - Second Highway Project :
            Credit 0523 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Highway Project consists of
            (a) improvement to two paved lanes of the Lilongwe-Kasungu
            road including a bypass around the Lilongwe industrial area
            and the reconstruction of the Lingadzi bridge; (b) a pilot
            program to improve the development and maintenance of
            district roads.
